attributes.additional_details: We want an immediate general election to be held. We think the majority need and want change.
attributes.background: We want an immediate general election to be held. We think the majority need and want change. This government has lost seats in many constituencies, evidencing loss in trust of the current government.

rejection.details:
Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election now!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
